name: HardBall '94
overview: Dig in at the dish with Bonds, Belle, Justice, Mattingly, Henderson, Gonzalez, Van Slyke and Kruk. Real major leaguers, swinging for the fences of 28 real big league ballparks found in all-new HardBall '94. What makes '94 great? Unsurpassed baseball realism. 1994 division re-alignment. Improved true-to-the-ballplayer animations. Plus a gutsy computer opponent. HardBall '94 is as close as you can get to The Show without a multi-year contract.
